leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 材料-DFT 生态（输入/求解/后处理）
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 结构生成→DFT→后处理→高通量→验证

queries: [WEB] band structure and dos plotter github

tools.name: Phonopy_VESTA
tools.one_line_profile: Converter to visualize Phonopy eigenvectors in VESTA
tools.detailed_description: A script to export vibrational modes (eigenvectors) from Phonopy calculation results into VESTA-compatible formats for visualization.

tools.name: XQueryer
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated system for material synthesis and characterization
tools.detailed_description: An integrated software-hardware smart system designed for material synthesis, characterization, crystal structure analysis, and visualization, supporting automated experiments.

tools.name: human_genomics_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for human genomics data processing
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow to process single samples or cohorts of Illumina paired-end sequencing data (WGS or WES) using standard tools like trim galore, bwa, GATK4, and parabricks.

tools.name: TrimGalore
tools.one_line_profile: Wrapper for adapter and quality trimming of FastQ files
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper around Cutadapt and FastQC to consistently apply adapter and quality trimming to FastQ files, with extra functionality for RRBS data.

tools.name: pymatgen-io-espresso
tools.one_line_profile: Pymatgen addon for parsing Quantum ESPRESSO files
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that extends pymatgen to support parsing and input generation for Quantum ESPRESSO calculations.

tools.name: DOSTransformer
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer model for Density of States prediction
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of 'Density of States Prediction of Crystalline Materials via Prompt-guided Multi-Modal Transformer' (NeurIPS 2023), enabling AI-based prediction of electronic properties.

tools.name: IR
tools.one_line_profile: Calculate IR Intensities from Dipole Approximation
tools.detailed_description: A Python package to calculate Infrared (IR) intensities using the dipole approximation, designed to work with Phonopy and VASP outputs.

tools.name: LobsterPy
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic bonding analysis with Lobster
tools.detailed_description: A Python package to perform automatic bonding analysis and plotting using outputs from the LOBSTER program (Local Orbital Basis Suite Towards Electronic-Structure Reconstruction).

tools.name: masci-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Post-processing toolkit for electronic structure calculations
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools for post-processing electronic structure calculations, primarily developed for the FLEUR code and AiiDA plugins by the Jülich DFT Team.

tools.name: qha
tools.one_line_profile: Thermodynamic properties calculator using quasi-harmonic approximation
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for calculating thermodynamic properties under quasi-harmonic approximation, using data from ab-initio calculations.

tools.name: nfp
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning layers for materials and chemistry
tools.detailed_description: Keras layers for end-to-end learning with rdkit and pymatgen, enabling the construction of neural networks for materials property prediction.

tools.name: pyband
tools.one_line_profile: Electronic band structure plotting tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for plotting electronic band structures using matplotlib, commonly used for VASP output visualization.

tools.name: LobsterPyGUI
tools.one_line_profile: GUI for LobsterPy analysis tool
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface for LobsterPy, facilitating the analysis of chemical bonding outputs from the LOBSTER code.

tools.name: ShakeNBreak
tools.one_line_profile: Defect structure-searching method
tools.detailed_description: A tool for defect structure-searching employing chemically-guided bond distortions to identify ground-state defect configurations.

tools.name: doped
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for defect supercell calculations
tools.detailed_description: A Python software for the generation, pre-/post-processing, and analysis of defect supercell calculations, implementing a reproducible defect simulation workflow.

tools.name: galore
tools.one_line_profile: Spectroscopy smearing tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for applying Gaussian and Lorentzian smearing to simulated spectra, useful for comparing DFT results with experimental data.

tools.name: sumo
tools.one_line_profile: Plotting and analysis toolkit for ab initio calculations
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for plotting and analysis of ab initio calculation data, including band structures, DOS, and phonon dispersion curves.

tools.name: surfaxe
tools.one_line_profile: Surface slab generation and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for generating and analyzing slab structures for first-principles calculations of surfaces.

tools.name: PPR-Phonon-Participation-Ratio
tools.one_line_profile: Phonon participation ratio calculator
tools.detailed_description: A tool for calculating phonon participation rates to characterize atomic vibrational information, including the degree of localization and delocalization.

tools.name: Phonons
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset of crystal structures, force constants, and phonon data from first-principles
tools.detailed_description: A collection of structures, force constants and phonon data obtained from first-principles calculations, serving as a dataset for materials science research.

tools.name: phononDB
tools.one_line_profile: Scraper and dataset for phonon calculations from Kyoto University database
tools.detailed_description: Phonon calculations scraped from the Phonon Database at Kyoto University, providing access to phonon data for various materials.

tools.name: Calculating-band-gaps-of-nonlinear-mechanical-metamaterials
tools.one_line_profile: ABAQUS and Python implementation for Bloch wave analysis of mechanical metamaterials
tools.detailed_description: A tool for calculating band gaps of nonlinear mechanical metamaterials via discretizing a representative volume element (RVE) and imposing complex-valued Bloch wave boundary conditions in ABAQUS.

tools.name: DynaPhoPy
tools.one_line_profile: Phonon anharmonicity analysis tool using molecular dynamics data
tools.detailed_description: Software to calculate phonon properties (frequencies, linewidths) and analyze anharmonicity from molecular dynamics simulations, interfacing with VASP, LAMMPS, and Phonopy.

tools.name: phonolammps
tools.one_line_profile: Interface for calculating phonons using LAMMPS and Phonopy
tools.detailed_description: A Python interface that connects LAMMPS molecular dynamics simulations with Phonopy for phonon calculations, enabling the use of empirical potentials for phonon analysis.

tools.name: aiida-phonopy
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for phonon calculations using Phonopy
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that integrates Phonopy, enabling automated and reproducible phonon calculations.

tools.name: qe-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Python tools for parsing and processing Quantum ESPRESSO data
tools.detailed_description: A set of Python tools designed to assist with parsing inputs/outputs and processing data from Quantum ESPRESSO calculations, developed by the AiiDA team.

tools.name: inkstone
tools.one_line_profile: Rigorous coupled-wave analysis (RCWA) solver for electromagnetic structures
tools.detailed_description: Efficient electromagnetic solver based on rigorous coupled-wave analysis for 3D and 2D multi-layered structures with in-plane periodicity, such as gratings and photonic crystals.

tools.name: ai4materials
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library for crystal structure recognition and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A library for applying deep learning techniques to materials science, specifically for crystal-structure recognition and analysis of atomic structures.

tools.name: beautiful-atoms
tools.one_line_profile: High-quality atom and molecule rendering tool using Blender
tools.detailed_description: A Python module that leverages Blender to create high-quality, publication-ready 3D renderings of atoms, molecules, and crystal structures.

tools.name: ARPESGUI
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB GUI for analyzing soft x-ray ARPES data
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB graphical user interface designed for the analysis of soft x-ray angle-resolved photoemission spectroscopy (SX-ARPES) data, specifically compatible with the ADRESS beamline at PSI.

tools.name: ARPEScape
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB tool for electronic structure analysis using PES/ARPES
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based application containing tools for analyzing the electronic structure of materials using photoelectron spectroscopy (PES) and ARPES techniques.

tools.name: ase-notebook
tools.one_line_profile: Advanced visualization for ASE/Pymatgen structures in Jupyter
tools.detailed_description: A tool providing highly configurable 2D (SVG) and 3D (Three.js) visualizations for atomic structures from ASE or Pymatgen within Jupyter Notebook environments.

tools.name: CrystalFp
tools.one_line_profile: Fingerprinting computation and analysis for crystal structures
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library for calculating and analyzing fingerprints of crystal structures, enabling structural comparison and classification.

tools.name: DeepMD-kit
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning package for many-body potential energy representation and MD
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning package that generates many-body potential energy representations for molecular dynamics simulations, bridging the gap between ab initio accuracy and classical efficiency.

tools.name: protTDA
tools.one_line_profile: Topological Data Analysis on protein structures
tools.detailed_description: A tool for performing Topological Data Analysis (TDA) on protein structures derived from crystallized data and AlphaFold DB.

tools.name: dftd4
tools.one_line_profile: Atomic-Charge Dependent London Dispersion Correction
tools.detailed_description: A generally applicable atomic-charge dependent London dispersion correction for density functional theory (DFT) calculations.

tools.name: Dopyqo
tools.one_line_profile: Many-body analysis on top of Quantum ESPRESSO calculations
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for performing many-body analysis based on the output of Quantum ESPRESSO calculations.

tools.name: sumolights
tools.one_line_profile: SUMO adaptive traffic signal control using RL
tools.detailed_description: A framework for adaptive traffic signal control in SUMO simulations using reinforcement learning algorithms like DQN and DDPG.

tools.name: SUMO (Maritime)
tools.one_line_profile: Search for Unidentified Maritime Objects
tools.detailed_description: A software tool for the search and identification of maritime objects, developed by the Joint Research Centre (JRC).

tools.name: Eclipse SUMO
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation of Urban MObility
tools.detailed_description: A highly portable, microscopic and continuous traffic simulation package designed to handle large networks and intermodal simulation.

tools.name: SUMO Challenge Library
tools.one_line_profile: Scene Understanding and Modeling Challenge Library
tools.detailed_description: A library supporting the Scene Understanding and Modeling (SUMO) challenge, providing tools for 3D scene analysis and computer vision tasks.

tools.name: SUMO-changing-lane-agent
tools.one_line_profile: RL agent for autonomous lane changing in SUMO
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of a reinforcement learning agent capable of performing autonomous lane changes within the SUMO traffic simulation environment.

tools.name: IFermi
tools.one_line_profile: Fermi surface generation, analysis and visualisation
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for the generation, analysis, and visualization of Fermi surfaces, integrating with VASP and other DFT codes.

tools.name: Flow
tools.one_line_profile: Computational framework for RL in traffic control
tools.detailed_description: A computational framework for deep reinforcement learning and control experiments for traffic microsimulation.

tools.name: bandstructureplots
tools.one_line_profile: Band structure plotting tool using pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating band structure plots with RGB scales to visualize atomic or orbital contributions, built on pymatgen.

tools.name: PhononFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow tools for phonon calculations with VASP and phonopy
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts and tools to streamline the workflow for phonon calculations using VASP and phonopy.

tools.name: vaspMD
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow tools for ab initio Molecular Dynamics with VASP
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts and tools to assist with ab initio Molecular Dynamics (AIMD) and Machine Learning Force Field MD calculations using VASP.

tools.name: gruneisen-formula
tools.one_line_profile: Thermal expansion calculator using Gruneisen formula
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool to calculate thermal expansion using the Gruneisen formula, based on outputs from VASP and Phonopy.

tools.name: GaLore
tools.one_line_profile: Memory-Efficient LLM Training by Gradient Low-Rank Projection
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing Gradient Low-Rank Projection (GaLore) for memory-efficient training of Large Language Models.

tools.name: smatool
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for calculating strength of materials
tools.detailed_description: An open-source first-principles computational toolkit for calculating the strength of materials in 1D, 2D, and 3D systems at zero and finite temperatures.

tools.name: adaptive-tls
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive traffic light control using Deep Multi-Agent RL
tools.detailed_description: A system for adaptive real-time traffic light signal control utilizing Deep Multi-Agent Reinforcement Learning.

tools.name: PhononSED
tools.one_line_profile: Phonon Lifetime calculation using Spectral Energy Density
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB tool for calculating phonon lifetimes using the Spectral Energy Density (SED) method based on molecular dynamics data.

tools.name: maptool
tools.one_line_profile: Materials Project Tool for simulation data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A tool for manipulating, analyzing, and visualizing input and output data from materials simulation codes, leveraging the Materials Project infrastructure.

tools.name: maptools
tools.one_line_profile: Materials simulation data processing program
tools.detailed_description: An open-source program for processing materials simulation data, built primarily on Pymatgen.

tools.name: phononTools
tools.one_line_profile: Analyzer for phonopy output files
tools.detailed_description: A Python program designed to analyze the output files generated by the phonopy software package.

tools.name: hzdplugins
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for AiiDA structure construction and viewing
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox plugin for AiiDA to assist in constructing and viewing initial structures for materials simulations.

tools.name: band_emc
tools.one_line_profile: VASP post-processing for Fermi surface and effective mass
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran tool to post-process VASP output files to obtain Fermi surfaces, fat band structures, and calculate effective mass.

tools.name: tools4vasp
tools.one_line_profile: Post-processing tools for VASP
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Fortran tools for post-processing output files from VASP calculations.

tools.name: ASearcher
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale reinforcement learning framework for search agents
tools.detailed_description: An open-source project implementing large-scale reinforcement learning algorithms specifically designed for search agents, facilitating research in automated search and optimization tasks.

tools.name: ASE_ANI
tools.one_line_profile: ANI-1 neural network potential interface for ASE
tools.detailed_description: A Python interface integrating the ANI-1 neural network potential with the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE), enabling machine learning-driven molecular dynamics and structure optimization.

tools.name: Julia-Phonons
tools.one_line_profile: Julia library for phonon calculations and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Julia codes designed for calculating and analyzing phonon properties in materials, facilitating lattice dynamics studies.

tools.name: vasp_scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Post-processing and analysis scripts for VASP calculations
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Bash and Python scripts designed to automate simple post-processing tasks and analyses for VASP density functional theory calculation outputs.

tools.name: GaLore
tools.one_line_profile: Memory-efficient LLM training via Gradient Low-Rank Projection
tools.detailed_description: A research tool implementing Gradient Low-Rank Projection (GaLore) for memory-efficient training of Large Language Models, enabling full-parameter learning on consumer hardware.

tools.name: vasp-interactive
tools.one_line_profile: ASE-compliant Python interface for VASP
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing an ASE (Atomic Simulation Environment) compliant interface to the VASP code, facilitating interactive DFT calculations and workflow automation.

tools.name: SumOfSquares.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Sum of Squares programming and optimization for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for Sum of Squares (SOS) programming, enabling the formulation and solution of polynomial optimization problems and semi-algebraic set analysis.

tools.name: NetworkDOS
tools.one_line_profile: Network Density of States calculation tool
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB tool for calculating the Network Density of States, a spectral analysis method for characterizing complex networks and graphs.

tools.name: ase_exploration
tools.one_line_profile: Robotic exploration planning based on forward simulation
tools.detailed_description: A C++ tool for planning robotic exploration paths using forward simulation techniques, applicable in autonomous systems research.

tools.name: LuSTScenario
tools.one_line_profile: Luxembourg SUMO Traffic (LuST) Scenario dataset
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive traffic simulation scenario for the city of Luxembourg, designed for use with the SUMO (Simulation of Urban MObility) traffic simulator for transportation research.

tools.name: MoSTScenario
tools.one_line_profile: Monaco SUMO Traffic (MoST) Scenario dataset
tools.detailed_description: A realistic traffic simulation scenario for Monaco, developed for the SUMO traffic simulator to support research in mobility and traffic management.

tools.name: matscipy
tools.one_line_profile: Atomic-scale materials science tools for Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for materials science at the atomic scale, providing tools for structure manipulation, analysis, and interfacing with simulation codes, extending the capabilities of ASE.

tools.name: DensityTool
tools.one_line_profile: Post-processing program for VASP charge densities
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran-based post-processing tool for analyzing charge density and electrostatic potential files generated by VASP calculations.

tools.name: pypi_malregistry
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset of malicious PyPI packages for software engineering research
tools.detailed_description: A curated dataset of malicious Python packages collected from PyPI, designed to support empirical studies and security research in the software supply chain ecosystem.

tools.name: RL_Highway_Merge
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-agent reinforcement learning for highway merging
tools.detailed_description: A research implementation applying multi-agent reinforcement learning techniques to solve autonomous vehicle highway merging scenarios.

tools.name: mcse
tools.one_line_profile: Library for manipulating and analyzing molecular crystal structures
tools.detailed_description: Molecular Crystal Simulation Library (mcse) is a Python package designed for the manipulation and analysis of molecular crystal structures, facilitating simulation workflows.

tools.name: dos-calc
tools.one_line_profile: Calculator for translational, rotational, and vibrational density of states
tools.detailed_description: A tool written in C for calculating the density of states (DOS) for translational, rotational, and vibrational degrees of freedom, useful in statistical mechanics and thermodynamics.

tools.name: MPWorks
tools.one_line_profile: Custom workflow manager for Materials Project integrating pymatgen and FireWorks
tools.detailed_description: A workflow package that merges pymatgen, custodian, and FireWorks to manage high-throughput materials calculations for the Materials Project infrastructure.

tools.name: Crystal Toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Web framework for materials science visualization and apps
tools.detailed_description: A framework for building web applications for materials science, providing components for rendering crystal structures and phase diagrams, powering the Materials Project website.

tools.name: MPmorph
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for running and analyzing ab-initio molecular dynamics (AIMD)
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools to run and analyze ab-initio molecular dynamics (AIMD) calculations performed with VASP, leveraging the Materials Project stack.

tools.name: pymatgen
tools.one_line_profile: Robust materials analysis code for structure definition and electronic structure analysis
tools.detailed_description: Python Materials Genomics (pymatgen) is a core library for materials analysis, defining classes for structures and molecules, and supporting input/output for many electronic structure codes like VASP.

tools.name: pymatgen-analysis-alloys
tools.one_line_profile: Pymatgen add-on for alloy system description and analysis
tools.detailed_description: An add-on package for pymatgen containing classes and methods specifically designed for describing alloy systems and analyzing relevant data.

tools.name: pymatgen-analysis-defects
tools.one_line_profile: Defect analysis modules for pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: A specialized add-on for pymatgen to analyze point defects in materials, including formation energies and thermodynamic properties.

tools.name: pymatgen-db
tools.one_line_profile: Database management tool for Materials Project-style data
tools.detailed_description: An addon to pymatgen that facilitates the creation and management of MongoDB databases for materials data, following Materials Project schemas.

tools.name: pymatgen-io-validation
tools.one_line_profile: Input/output validator for VASP calculations
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive validator to ensure VASP calculation inputs and outputs are compatible with Materials Project data standards and quality control requirements.

tools.name: pymatgen-analysis-diffusion
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for analyzing diffusion in materials
tools.detailed_description: An add-on to pymatgen providing algorithms and tools for analyzing diffusion pathways and mechanisms in materials, often used for battery materials.

tools.name: dfttoolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Routines for pre- and post-processing DFT calculations
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python routines designed to assist with the pre-processing setup and post-processing analysis of Density Functional Theory (DFT) calculations.

tools.name: Multi-Agent-Distributed-PPO-Traffc-light-control
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-agent RL for traffic light control in SUMO
tools.detailed_description: A scientific simulation tool implementing distributed Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO) for multi-agent traffic light control using the SUMO traffic simulator.

tools.name: spglib.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia bindings for the spglib space-group library
tools.detailed_description: Provides Julia bindings for spglib, a C library for finding and handling crystal symmetries, essential for materials structure analysis.

tools.name: plexe-pyapi
tools.one_line_profile: Python API to control Plexe models in SUMO
tools.detailed_description: Python interface for controlling Plexe (Platooning Extension) models within the SUMO traffic simulator, enabling research into vehicle platooning and traffic dynamics.

tools.name: Topological_Analysis
tools.one_line_profile: Topological analysis for Li ion pathways in crystals
tools.detailed_description: A tool for performing topological analysis of Lithium local space, sites, and diffusion pathways within crystal structures, useful for battery material research.

tools.name: reinforcement-learning-sumo
tools.one_line_profile: Integration of RL with SUMO traffic simulation via Ray RLLIB
tools.detailed_description: A framework connecting Reinforcement Learning algorithms (via Ray RLLIB) with the SUMO traffic microsimulator, adapting SUMO to the OpenAI Gym interface for research.

tools.name: abcv
tools.one_line_profile: Python-based crystal viewer using fresnel and pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: A visualization tool for crystal structures that leverages pymatgen for structure handling and fresnel for high-quality rendering.

tools.name: DOS-integration
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to integrate Density of States (DOS) data
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran utility to perform numerical integration of Density of States (DOS) data using Simpson's rule, facilitating electronic structure analysis.

tools.name: VASP-DOS-plots
tools.one_line_profile: Plotting tool for VASP Projected Density of States
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran code designed to extract and plot projected density of states (PDOS) including spin polarization and spin-orbit coupling from VASP output files.

tools.name: OdbDesign
tools.one_line_profile: Library for parsing ODB++ electronics design archives
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library for parsing and accessing data from ODB++ Design archives, which are standard in electronics manufacturing, enabling analysis of netlists and product models.

tools.name: EPW-nano
tools.one_line_profile: Modified EPW code for electron transport and thermoelectric properties
tools.detailed_description: A modified version of the EPW code tailored for first-principles calculations of electron transport and thermoelectric properties, incorporating various scattering mechanisms.

tools.name: VASProcar
tools.one_line_profile: Python tools for extracting results from VASP output files
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for parsing and extracting data from various VASP output files (CONTCAR, PROCAR, DOSCAR, etc.) to facilitate post-processing.

tools.name: ASE (Adversarial Skill Embeddings)
tools.one_line_profile: Adversarial skill embeddings for physically simulated characters
tools.detailed_description: A research code for training controllers for physically simulated characters using adversarial skill embeddings, applicable in robotics and physics-based animation.

tools.name: SUMO Ontology
tools.one_line_profile: Suggested Upper Merged Ontology (SUMO)
tools.detailed_description: The source repository for the Suggested Upper Merged Ontology (SUMO), a foundational ontology used for knowledge representation and reasoning in AI and information science.

tools.name: pymatgen-io-openmm
tools.one_line_profile: Pymatgen IO module for OpenMM simulations
tools.detailed_description: A pymatgen extension that facilitates the setup and input generation for OpenMM molecular dynamics simulations, bridging materials and soft matter simulation tools.

tools.name: VASP-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of tools for VASP pre- and post-processing
tools.detailed_description: A set of Python scripts and tools for preparing inputs and analyzing outputs from VASP DFT calculations.

tools.name: Envelope-for-QE-PH-calculations
tools.one_line_profile: Envelopes for IR and Raman spectra from Quantum Espresso
tools.detailed_description: A tool to generate spectral envelopes for IR and Raman spectra calculated by the PHonon package of Quantum Espresso.

tools.name: CrystalExplorer
tools.one_line_profile: Crystal structure analysis with Hirshfeld surfaces
tools.detailed_description: Source code for CrystalExplorer, a standard tool for analyzing crystal structures using Hirshfeld surfaces and calculating intermolecular interaction energies.

tools.name: phonopy
tools.one_line_profile: Open source package for phonon calculations at harmonic and quasi-harmonic levels
tools.detailed_description: A widely used software package for calculating phonon properties (band structures, DOS, thermodynamics) from first-principles force constants.

tools.name: evgraf
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric analysis of crystal structures
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for the geometric analysis of crystal structures, likely focusing on symmetry, environment, or shape descriptors.

tools.name: Lbster
tools.one_line_profile: Language models for biological sequence transformation and evolutionary representation
tools.detailed_description: Lbster is a library leveraging language models for biological sequence analysis, specifically focusing on transformation and evolutionary representation of biological sequences, useful in bioinformatics and computational biology.

tools.name: pyiron
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated development environment (IDE) for computational materials science
tools.detailed_description: pyiron is a workflow management system and integrated development environment designed for computational materials science. It simplifies the setup, execution, and analysis of complex simulation protocols (e.g., DFT, MD) and supports reproducibility.

tools.name: BBO-Rietveld
tools.one_line_profile: Automated crystal structure analysis using blackbox optimization
tools.detailed_description: BBO-Rietveld is a tool for automated crystal structure analysis, specifically performing Rietveld refinement using blackbox optimization techniques to determine crystal structures from diffraction data.

tools.name: OpenFermion
tools.one_line_profile: Library for compiling and analyzing quantum algorithms for electronic structure simulations
tools.detailed_description: OpenFermion is an open-source library for compiling and analyzing quantum algorithms to simulate fermionic systems, including quantum chemistry. It provides tools for generating and manipulating fermionic and qubit Hamiltonians.

tools.name: LOBSTER-Dataset-Tools
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for generating and analyzing the LOBSTER small molecule dataset
tools.detailed_description: This repository provides tools to generate and analyze the LOBSTER dataset (Large-scale OBservation of Small-molecule conformatERs), facilitating research in small molecule superpositions and conformational analysis.

tools.name: pyprocar
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for electronic structure pre/post-processing
tools.detailed_description: PyProcar is a robust Python library designed for the pre- and post-processing of electronic structure data from DFT codes like VASP, Elk, and Quantum Espresso. It specializes in analyzing and plotting band structures, projected density of states, and Fermi surfaces.

tools.name: pysktb
tools.one_line_profile: Solver for Slater Koster tight-binding topological hamiltonians
tools.detailed_description: pysktb is a scientific Python package designed to solve Slater-Koster tight-binding Hamiltonians, particularly useful for studying topological materials and electronic properties.

tools.name: Spglib.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia wrapper for the spglib crystal symmetry library
tools.detailed_description: Spglib.jl provides Julia bindings for the spglib C library, enabling crystal symmetry detection and manipulation directly within the Julia programming environment for materials science applications.

tools.name: Phonopy-Spectroscopy
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for simulating vibrational spectra interfacing with Phonopy
tools.detailed_description: Phonopy-Spectroscopy is a collection of tools that interface with the Phonopy package to simulate and analyze vibrational spectra (IR, Raman) from phonon calculations.

tools.name: spglib
tools.one_line_profile: C library for finding and handling crystal symmetries
tools.detailed_description: Spglib is a widely used C library for finding and handling crystal symmetries, space groups, and primitive cells, serving as a foundational tool in computational materials science.

tools.name: spglib-rs
tools.one_line_profile: Rust bindings for the spglib crystal symmetry library
tools.detailed_description: spglib-rs provides Rust bindings for the spglib library, allowing Rust developers to utilize spglib's crystal symmetry finding capabilities in materials science software.

tools.name: spinspg
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for detecting spin space groups
tools.detailed_description: Spinspg is a Python package built on top of spglib for detecting and analyzing spin space groups (magnetic space groups), essential for studying magnetic materials.

tools.name: carmm
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for geometric and electronic structure analysis of molecular models
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts for the creation, manipulation, and analysis of geometric and electronic structures of molecular models, likely associated with the Center for Chemical Innovation.

tools.name: chemtools
tools.one_line_profile: Interpretive chemical tools for analyzing quantum chemistry outputs
tools.detailed_description: A collection of interpretive chemical tools designed for analyzing the outputs of quantum chemistry calculations, facilitating the extraction of chemical insights from raw data.

tools.name: quantum_esperanto
tools.one_line_profile: Fast parser for VASP XML logs
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance parser written in Cython specifically designed for processing XML log files produced by the VASP (Vienna Ab initio Simulation Package) software.

tools.name: veins-gym
tools.one_line_profile: Reinforcement Learning interface for VANET simulations
tools.detailed_description: A framework connecting the Veins vehicular network simulator with OpenAI Gym, enabling Reinforcement Learning-based research and simulations for Vehicular Ad Hoc Networks (VANETs).

tools.name: phonon-transmission
tools.one_line_profile: Harmonic phonon transmission calculator from MD trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A tool to calculate harmonic phonon transmission coefficients using data derived from molecular dynamics trajectories, useful for studying thermal transport properties.

tools.name: OpenCDA
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for cooperative driving automation simulation
tools.detailed_description: A generalized framework for prototyping and simulating full-stack cooperative driving automation applications, integrating CARLA and SUMO simulators for robotics and transportation research.

tools.name: SAMOSA
tools.one_line_profile: Structural Activation via Metal Oxidation State Analysis
tools.detailed_description: A protocol and tool for generating activated crystal structures from experimental crystallographic information by removing solvents and analyzing metal oxidation states.

tools.name: MAST
tools.one_line_profile: Materials Simulation Toolkit for pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: MAterials Simulation Toolkit (MAST) designed to work with pymatgen to automate and manage computational materials science workflows and simulations.

tools.name: MAST-ML
tools.one_line_profile: Materials Simulation Toolkit for Machine Learning
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolkit designed to facilitate the application of machine learning to materials science data, including preprocessing, model training, and analysis.

tools.name: ramannoodle
tools.one_line_profile: Off-resonance Raman spectra calculator from VASP
tools.detailed_description: A tool to efficiently compute off-resonance Raman spectra from first-principles calculations (specifically VASP) using polynomial models and machine learning techniques.

tools.name: TTEP
tools.one_line_profile: Thermal transport calculator using constant electron-phonon coupling
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran code designed for the efficient calculation of thermal transport properties based on the constant electron-phonon coupling approximation.

tools.name: Unifiedkappa-phonopy
tools.one_line_profile: Lattice thermal conductivity calculator using ShengBTE and Phonopy
tools.detailed_description: Scripts and modified Phonopy modules to compute diagonal and off-diagonal lattice thermal conductivity utilizing outputs from ShengBTE.

tools.name: ternary-diagram
tools.one_line_profile: Library for drawing ternary diagrams
tools.detailed_description: A Python package specifically designed to draw beautiful ternary diagrams (phase diagrams) easily, offering an alternative to pymatgen's plotting capabilities.

tools.name: QEbandplot
tools.one_line_profile: Band structure plotter for Quantum Espresso
tools.detailed_description: Python scripts designed to plot electronic band structures directly from Quantum Espresso (pwscf) bands.x output files.

tools.name: sisl
tools.one_line_profile: Electronic structure package for large scale DFT/NEGF analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for post-analysis and manipulation of electronic structure calculations, supporting large-scale tight-binding DFT and NEGF (Non-Equilibrium Green's Function) calculations.

tools.name: PhononIrep
tools.one_line_profile: Phonon irreducible representations calculator
tools.detailed_description: A tool written in Mathematica for calculating phonon irreducible representations, aiding in the symmetry analysis of lattice dynamics.
